EmailTemplate.name: Notification to COM & PM Users on PIA Record Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: A Post Install {!FS_Installation__c.RecordType} against {!FS_Installation__c.Outlet_ACN__c} and {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet_Name__c} Requires Attention
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
A Post Install {!FS_Installation__c.RecordType} {!FS_Installation__c.Name} for Outlet {!FS_Installation__c.FS_Outlet_Name__c} has been created and may require you to take action.
Thank You, FET
